about_the_game:
About this DLC:


In Aquarium Designer: Amazonia DLC, you could create new or redecorate existing aquariums with new exotic items straight from one of the longest rivers, Amazon! Admire fish native to this region and watch them get along with the others!

10 new Species:


The Amazon River is full of many fish, inhabited natively to this river, and now you can bring them to your aquarium. Among the fish, you will find: the Black Ghost Knife Fish, the Golden Otocinclus, the Bronze Corydoras, the Piranha, the Splash Tetra, the Blackfin Pacu, the Bucktooth Tetra, the Becford's Pencilfish, the Raphael Catfish, and the Four-eyed Fish.

Over 20 new scenery elements:


Apart from fish, this DLC adds a lot of new items like plants, decors, roots, and stones to make your Amazon River fish feel at home. You can also place a Mayan decorations in your existing aquarium and let your fish learn about a new culture. They will enjoy it! To make them happy, you can use unique decorations and plants, to create a similar neighborhood that will remind them of swimming in the Amazon River.

name: Aquarium Designer - Amazonia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
